name: 凯文·查孔

last_movies.title: 杰西卡·琼斯 第三季
杰西卡·琼斯 第二季

introduction: Kevin Chacon started his artistic career with the acting school Rybin Studio of Drama in 2016, and is currently represented by its counterpart, Rybin Talent Management. The direction he has had along with his talent and dedication led him to book the leading role of Vido in Jessica Jones, where he acts alongside stars such as Krysten Ritter, J.R. Ramirez, Rachel Taylor and Carrie-Anne Moss. Kevin is one of several Hispanic artists from the Tri-State area of New York, New Jersey and Connecticut developed by the actress, teacher, and artistic manager of children, Susan Rybin, who has more than 30 years of experience in the entertainment industry. In one of the most recent productions of Rybin Studio of Drama, Kevin played the lead role in the bilingual adaptation of The Little Prince. More credits include Nickelodeon promos for Double Dare and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Kevin received the HOLA Award for Emerging Artist in 2018.
